name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Max Devoe DONALDSON, Jr., Appellant

judges: Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson and zappala, jj.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Max Devoe DONALDSON, Jr., Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Ralph T. Forr, Jr., Hollidaysburg, for appellant.
Daniel Lee Howsare, Dist. Atty., Greensburg, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
460 A.2d 1087
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Max Devoe DONALDSON, Jr., Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 21, 1983.
Decided April 29, 1983.
Reargument Denied June 22, 1983.
Ralph T. Forr, Jr., Hollidaysburg, for appellant.
Daniel Lee Howsare, Dist. Atty., Greensburg, for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, hutchinson and zappala, jj.
